TEXT.TITLE: WESTLB RAISES AUSTRALIAN DLR BOND TO 75 MLN
TEXT.BODY: Westdeutsche Landesbank Girozentrale (WestLB said it is raising the amount of a 14-3/8 pct five-year bullet Australian dlr eurobond, priced at 101-1/2, to 75 mln dlrs from 50 mln. The bond, for WestLB's WestLB Finance NV subsidiary, also will have an additional co-manager to the 20 already accepted into the deal, WestLB said. WestLB is lead manager, with Hambros Bank Ltd as co-lead. Other terms of the bond, launched on March 19, remain the same, the bank said. REUTER
